title: Harrap's Pocket Italian Verbs (Harrap's language Guides)
features: Bring your Italian language skills to life with verbs!
From the publisher of leading bilingual dictionaries, here is a handy, high-quality reference covering essentials that you need to know about Italian verbs.
provides complete conjugation tables of the 200 most commonly used verbs.
